content: Generally OK, but the "My orders" part is super flaky. ¬∂ Feature showing the driver's location is really cool, but SO FLAKY. Lately it shows me a map that is .75" high on my 5" screen, a mini postage-stamp -high strip. Above it there's "Now arriving today" and a picture of the item, and below it is‚Ä¶supposed to be the Update dlivery instructions/Share tracking buttons, but actually I just see all blank whitespace. If I scroll up (losing the map), then those buttons properly paint. So‚Ä¶bad refresh logic. Galaxy S7 Android 8.0.0. ¬∂ Notifications on package delivery are inconsistent. Since nobody rings the doorbell anymore, I feel like thieves can steal the package in the 30-60 minutes it takes to get a notification that the package is delivered. ¬∂ It's slow to get to your orders (click on the "person" icon, takes 10 seconds, then Your Orders takes another few). ¬∂ Track Shipment, See all Updates is too many clicks, with attendant slowness between. ¬∂ It's annoying to refresh. Should be able to pull down instead of going back twice and then going to See all Updates again. ¬∂ Should be able to Swipe Left/Right between items in the Shipment details screen, but you can't. Do some UX testing, Amazon!

"ADD TO LIST" function is very very slow! I select a product, scroll down and tap "ADD TO LIST" nothing happens. I tap multiple times, and it takes 4+ seconds to respond. I use the list functionality a lot, and it's functioned poorly on this app for as long as I can recall. To add 10 individual items to lists, takes a very long time. It's too inconvenient to try to inform amazon of this problem any other way besides just leaving a low review.

With the recent changes I do like the three options at bottom to navigate. I prefer the prev frame by frame of product photos, not how they slide now, skipping over pics. When I attempt to go back to prev products that I've recently viewed as before, the app randomly takes me back to the main page, then back to the previous item, or it completely backs me out of the app. I do like the prev viewed option but it doesn't go very far back. The new feat. are not more convenient at all.

The Amazon app used to be easy to navigate. Since the update, it is awkward and more difficult to quickly locate things, like 'orders' which had been in the same place for years. Also, since September, other item options are un-clickable. You cannot select them to view, only order without seeing the product. The new app is terrible!!! Please fix!!! I have found that I just back out, abandon the whole idea, and skip ordering altogether. I'll shop elsewhere until it's fixed!

the app works great the majority of the time! But I dislike some changes such as the inability to "contact us" by email directly from the order summary page. Or chat with a live person. Having to hit next to scroll through results, it used to load in one continuous list...which reminds me, the filters could be stronger for searches. Can't filter by est delivery date for one example...for such a huge site one would think filters and sorting would be the best in the business. I still like the app

Never had an issue with the app, really enjoyed it.. but recently started experiencing issues with scrolling through my wishlists. It gets glitchy and doesn't want to scroll down, so I'm unable to see and view items I've saved which is extremely inconvenient. Updates are all up to date. I'm disappointed, I'm better off using a web browser. If this isn't a problem for you though, I highly recommend.

You would think that a multi-billion dollar company could afford to run a decent app! It used to run super smooth, but anymore if you're on it more than a few minutes, it becomes laggy, glitchy, and non responsive. Browsing and comparing products has become a nightmare because you either can't look between different colors or sizes, or it won't pull up the option to save things to a list. So frustrating

Amazon customer for 15+ years and enjoyed using the app until recently. After last update app completely froze. It did not respond to any buttons. I restarted the app, cleared the cache, turned my Samsung phone off and back on. Still no response. Was impossible to delete app for reinstallation. Eventually the app reverted to the previous addition on it's own without the smile and worked. An update appeared in the Play Store. I am afraid to update for fear of reoccurrence of problem.

The app used to be lightspeeed fast... After a year of interface redesigns and updates, it's probably one of the most sluggish apps I've ever seen out there. Full size photos in product reviews take forever to load... After few failed attempts, I don't even try clicking on video reviews anymore -- I simply don't have 5 extra minutes to wait for each 30 sec video to loadü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è It keep crashing constantly, clicking on product links shows "oops, something went wrong puppy" in like 50% cases..

Okay, y'all need to STOP messing w this app. It was 100% GREAT before. It worked, was easy to get to your different places, it loaded quick... BUT NOW you people keep fudging with it & it's annoying to find stuff. This is over here, that is now over there in an extremeply inconvenient spot. Things don't load correctly, the layout is horrible. Leave it alone, only thing that should be changed at all is this hideous app face y'all picked for some reason.

Amazon Engineers ruined the app. The app worked fine before, the UI was fluent and it was fast. I am using a Note 20 Ultra, the new recent update has turned the app into a cumbersome clunky experience with major latency issues. I've spent over 21 grand this year via Amazon and I'll be using another service until this is fixed. It's too aggravating! Stop trying to fix what isn't broken. Is each engineer trying to impress their boss with each new update? The old version was perfect!

Update 2sep21...my wishlist is still buggy, it lags and jumps as it processes the "inspired by your wish list" recommendations that I disabled weeks ago. I use this app far too often! Aside from the layout changes which i don't like for the same reasons as other reviewers, scrolling thru my wish list is now glitchy...when I try to scroll up it jumps back down, takes several screen swipes to finally work. Also, search results don't show pics for the last 4 items on the page.

There is an issue with the chat with Customer service in the app. When I start typing the keyboard on your phone overshadows the typing field, so you actually cannot see what you are typing. I have to close the keyboard in order to see/change my text/fix mistakes. Not very convenient. I keep installing and uninstalling the app because of this only so I can chat faster with the Customer support.

Why would you try to 'fix' something that's not broken? The "Orders" tab was previously so accessible - to access the products that had been ordered. With the new UI, it's buried at the bottom of a menu with a ton of other things, under another sub heading called "Your Stuff". Way too many keystrokes + gestures to access such fundamental/accessed information. It got me so frustrated (built up over the course of the past several times I used the app), that I felt obligated to rant about it.

App was great before the latest update. Not sure what made the developers decide to make changes because it was fine before. Been having issues with scrolling/selecting through item pictures. Eg. When there is multiple colors of the same item and you click it the item changes but the picture is faded out as if the item was out of stock but its not out of stock if that makes sense.

Have started experiencing a glitch when viewing wishlists on mobile. When trying to scroll down, the list gets all jumpy and goes back to the top. If I persist, it scrolls down, then when I try to scroll further, it does the jumping again. Once I get far enough down the list, it stops. Super annoying. Edit: Almost two months later, still having this issue. Have deleted/reinstalled, turned phone off/on again, etc.

App is unusable now for me. Not sure what they changed, but every time I look something up on it, the app crashes and says "uh oh something went wrong on our end." I've tried all the fixes suggested on multiple help pages, nothing works. Honestly though, it's probably a good thing, since I've definitely made fewer impulse purchases lol

For the last few months, not matter what time of day or night I've tried to shop on Amazon via the app, IT KEEPS CRASHING!! I'll be smack in the middle of searching for or looking at an item's page or even in the middle of a transaction &this keeps crashing!! I've let customer service know because I needed help with ordering stuff so it would arrive by the time I needed it, but I don't remember if I had e-mailed the dev team more recently besides in July possibly. This has gone on sporadically.

A BIG prob I've noticed recently has happened when I've tried to chg my choice of some of the products to see how they look. Sometimes, altho the descriptions state that the choices R "in stock," the resulting photos of the product in the color (or other chg) I want to view are grayed out &I'm unable to scroll the photos. A recent update makes the chat feature incredibly frustrating to use because you can't see what you're typing unless you minimize the keyboard and then you have no way of editing because as soon as the keyboard comes back up, you can't see the chat box. It's so annoying I'm about to uninstall because I can't use customer service chat without it opening the app. Hopefully this review will do something to get it fixed.

4 one time passwords (confirmed correct by amazon) 4 times not accepted by the delivery driver. No clear way to cancel items you haven't received yet. Very very poor experience over all. Live chat help that is clearly from a script. What's the point in having security with one time passwords if they aren't working correctly. Pointless and a waste of time.

Ever since the update when I go and look at a product and try to switch between different options and colors it freezes up. Sometimes after I switch back and forth between the different colors of the product they will finally load the pictures but that's only if I get lucky. It also won't let me save certain colors of products to my wish list. What's going on? why did you even update something that didn't need fixed????

I use this app on my my S21 Ultra to search & shop for books. I probably order on average at least 10 books a month from you guys. You are a trillion dollar company & you can't even provide your loyal customers with an app that functions properly! For 2 months now I have not been able to scroll through my saved lists without it continuously freezing. I can't even view items I've saved to my lists without it being a huge headache! Already tried reinstalling the app. Doesn't work! Fix it now!

Once again Amazon just can't keep from changing a good thing. STOP moving the items on the app around. ORDERS and items associated need to remain in one place. While the app has improved in speed, functionality -no matter how good it gets - suffers because users keep having to look for options that move around. Msg to developer management: have a user review committe - customers who DONT work for AMAZON.

Recently on startup this app just hangs while it waits for advertising to load that shows a spinning disc if scrolling down the page & won't respond until that's finished. Can't type to search or go to other tabs until it's done whatever it's trying to do. If I clear the storage & cache on the app it's fine again, but next time I use the app it does the same annoying freeze up. Terrible user experience when I know exactly what I want to buy and I have to wait. This happens on both of my devices

The last update has made it impossible to look at pictures of items I possibly want to buy. It freezes during the loading process and I can't click or scroll through any of the photos for the product. I rarely write reviews, but Amazon's updates lately have been terrible. Even moving the buttons around so now everything is on the bottom is just an inconvenience. Normally I order everything on Amazon, lately I find myself looking on other sites due to just the recent updates.

Recent updates are AWFUL! I've been a Prime member for 7yrs+ and never had an issue with the app until this past month. When clicking to view an item's different options/styles, the pictures will not load or scroll and loading takes forever trying to click back. The app randomly glitches you back to the Home page now, also. PLEASE UN-UPDATE ASAP and bring back the "drag & drop" feature for Lists/Favorites.

Can honestly say I have used the app for several years no problem but since the change of the app interface, I am no longer able to see delivery dates when multiple purchasing. The app almost forces you into subscribe and save and makes it difficult to make one off purchases. There was nothing wrong with the former layout, but the removal of the top left menu and buttons on the lower makes it harder to navigate. it also implies someone is trying to justify there position within the company.

I love Amazon but the app has room for improvement. the app seems to be more efficient (less crashes / loads faster) with the newer phone. However, recently there are formatting problems. search results are much larger than my phone screen. have to pan all around outside of my viewing window to see the list. Find myself using my web browser. Also, some products are OVER ADVERTISED.... TOO MUCH! Also, wish they would get rid of the pages of results and for the love of pete ALLOW DARK MODE, pls

App is clunky and horribly slow to respond, even on high-speed wifi connections. Ads for "sponsored" products take up too much space in the search results (often disguised as a curated list of "top" products) and at the top of the page on a product you're viewing. The effect is to hide better related products under a mountain of sponsored items that may be irrelevant to the user. A poorly designed, unresponsive app intended to manipulate users into purchasing select products.

What ON EARTH was wrong with having the nav in the top left corner like the rest of humanity does? I can't believe this hasn't gone back to the nice, sensible, usable way it was until a few months ago. It was so great before, and it was really straightforward to get around the app. Now I just spend all my time obsessing about how annoying and just plain stupid the nav is at the bottom of the page. It's such a glaring error that it actually distracts from the rest of Amazon's cleverness.

Pretty good app except on Android when chatting with a customer service representative, the keyboard blocks the area you're typing instead of having it shift up so you're forced to type without seeing your message unless you keep minimizing to check for errors. It would be nice if this was fixed as it's been a problem for a while.

Indescribable. Such an amazing app/store/lifechanging innovation. I am so inspired, moved and touched by Amazon and my experiences with them. Here is an app that made a name for itself and has spread around the world. Jeff Bezos, hats off to you. I mean, honestly. The customer service is phenomenal, the little notes that they leave for example giving me free shipping all day and for what?To show appreciation for my business. Heard it's a great company to work for & love all the charity they do!

This app is broken. I'm tryin to find shoes, which in itself is impossible for me, but when I start to search & click on stuff the whole thing just freezes & I have to exit. The longer I use it the worse it gets until I'm forced to log off. Nothing wants to load.. the pictures, the products, the entire page. Idk what yinz did to this app to make it lag SO MUCH but I feel like I'm stuck using 90's dial-up again each time I open it. It shouldn't take 4mins just to tell me this shoe is unavailable!

The guy didn't know how to guide me to sign out button on the app. I had to change accounts and the button was nowhere there. Hate new and extra layered levels & pop out things on a cell phone! Way more annoying than convenient. It mostly just gets in the way when trying to click on a different layer or scroll thru search results. Y'all also pushing items like an ugly incel looking for sex! We're already here to shop! Stop being so pushy & forceful! Hate the new double slide out menus, hate the new Alexa option. Let me turn them off & Get them out of the way! Ready to delete from my cell!

The worst app for downloading mp3s on. Buying an album is easy, really easy.... But getting them to play on your phone, or anything for that matter. CHANGE THE WAY YOU SELL MUSIC, IT'S BS THAT I HAVE TO GO WAY OUT OF THE WAY, TRACK DOWN WHAT I JUST BOUGHT, THEN DOWNLOAD TRACK BY TRACK. Takes way to long. Worse music downloader I've ever used!

If you have not received your package within 3 days you can come back here for a replacement or refund" I understand things happen that are out of their control, but it's been happening way too many times; making it very unreliable. The main reason I used Amazon was for the Next day delivery option.

Loved the app until the new update 5/2021. They changed the UI and ruined it and now my cart is bugged out and I can't access it. It just goes to my recent search. Literally can't purchase anything on Amazon. That's like not being able to search anything on Google. Why fix what's not broken. It was perfect before. Edit-9/2021 STOP MOVING EVERYTHING AROUND WITH UI UPDATES. JUST QUIT. IT GETS WORSE WITH EVERY UPDATE.

New app is so bloated it takes five or more steps just to get to your orders and information. sponsored ads and unrelated products make search results unreliable. This clutter is frustrating to us that preferred a focused search to quickly find specific products for purchase. I now give up and go to another source to find something that previously was so easy on Amazon. Shame!

Amazon drivers sucks. For the past couple of items I ordered it went two ways. They either didn't follow instructions nor take pictures. Or they deliver it to the wrong place which is across the street from my place. I should know because I receive packages that's for another apartments across the street from mines. amazon's customer service is generally really quick and friendly, but the app makes getting into contact with them awful. if you exit the app or your screen goes dark, the chances of you getting back into your support chat are next to none. the service ai is also completely useless, and mentions having someone call me despite the fact that i don't have my number on my account. it also doesn't correctly update for things like your order being mispicked, and will show an incorrect delivery date.

Oh my goodness! If you already don't have this app well it's never to late! It's has everything under the sun you can think of to buy and for the cheapest prices from anyone! Shopping is also free. If you upgrade to amazon prime you get 2 more apps plus always free shipping and next day shipping offered. I couldn't live without it. Yes they even deliver food! I mean everything!

Besides Alexa ordering the music subscription repeatedly and I got stuck paying 2 different ones plus the subscription that comes free with prime. I havent a bad thing to say about amazon. Everything you can think of reasonably priced with fastest delivery possible. Cant beat it. Just be careful what you say around Alexa. She likes to spend $$$ without you knowing

Every time I order something they end up having to cancel. Always a pleasure shopping on this app. The only problem I've ever had, was usps shipping. I had to have all my deliveries shipped to a friend's address because they would deliver to my neighbors...some of which would keep the items. When I did get an order, and this is with all orders even at my friends place, the package looks as of they played soccer with it. The items I did not receive, Amazon has always made sure I was reimbursed for them, even though they did nothing wrong. Amazon is A+!

I have loved Amazon since the beginning I basically chose this store first before the local shops. The variety of products from all over the world is what I think I love the most. You can buy anything from costumes to kitchen soap.The return policy is A's in my book. I can return it with minimal problems attach a shipping label done. Easy as that. Even with technical support for appliances or electronics I either get a walk through instructions or replacement. I love Amazon!

Displays as if you're making a transaction on refreshes and on going to the account page. It would alarming for those who don't know that the same request isn't being made more than once and gives the impression they're repurchasing items already bought. Not impressed. Search doesn't seem to understand/care what you're looking for and is only interested in suggesting selling. It runs fine for the first two pages then lags, sometimes so bad I have to restart. This app is obviously more interested in data collection and impulse sales than being helpful.

As of a couple of updates ago the wishlist scrolling is broken. (My wishlist is full of Kindle books, scrolling down is a shuddering, doesn't want to scroll down, mess. Scrolling in the other direction is fine if you can fight your way down the list) And now there's an Alexa bubble obscuring the UI that won't go away even though Alexa is disabled. Earlier: Don't like the recent changes to wish list controls. Who wants to scroll a fixed sized sub panel when half the screen is unused?

Amazon is great and all, well, that is if you don't consider the amount of junk you have to go through just to find a decent product, and if you can overlook the fact that the app (and website) looks like it's made to work exclusively with Windows 98, I'm guessing they like vintage, but at least make the interface usable for the common user. I mean, Zara's website is better than Amazon's. Do better, Jeff.

EDIT STILL IN NEED OF IMPROVEMENT Latest update was also a reordering of menu layout and other seen and unseen stuff. Searches still not returning with what I would consider accurate or relevant hits. I think this new update makes it harder to find menu items and options. I have not noticed anything I consider better or improved. Could be better. App is overloaded with everything Amazon has trying to shove it down your throat.

bad to terrible app! annoying lack of control! can't get rid of Alexa list! to many clicks required to get anywhere now. the search was never the best! It shows you sometime everything but the brand or item you search for! But now they want to force you to have an Alexa list and you can't get rid of it so you always have to do many Taps to get to the list that you want to! Even though they have a default icon on your list you still can't use it. You still have to deal with selecting the list.

I love Amazon, but please stop changing the App format and moving things like "My Orders" around. This latest version is the worst you have come out with ever! There is an old saying " If it isn't broke, don't fix it". Please revert back to the previous version or sort this current diabolical mess out. Please please please stop messing with the App all time!

I hate that I have to switch to a browser to have the Smile donation feature active. It should be automatic for the account, not because I'm on a specific web page. Update --Thanks for doing this! ======Update Sept 10, 2021===== The new app layout is HORRIBLE! What kind of idiot puts the controls on the bottom? I can not find anything now, and I need to review subscribe & save. Gah - someone needs to make a better Amazon app, cause it is getting annoying.

Slow as hell sometimes. I don't know what it is, but searching for certain items causes the whole app to freeze. Please fix the app, it's been terrible lately. I'm on a Pixel 5 phone, so it's fairly new and certainly can't be the hardware. 8GB of RAM should be more then sufficient for an app.

Why can't you just put the menu in the upper left corner like every other app on the planet. And then have the categories listed then broken into subcategories. That way a person can zoom to read and navigate. Your app is ridiculous. The sorting is horrific. It's easier to use the desktop site on a 3 inch screen phone.

Unable to install the application. I was using Amazon India. Changed my playstore country to UK when I moved here. Uninstalled Indian version of Amazon and tried installing the UK version many times but it always fails. This issue is not just for me I know a lot of people who is facing this issue, all moved to UK from India. Its the same with FireTV stick as well. I can't use my original email ID. It shows all Indian FireTV option. They should have county specific options for people like me.

This used to be my happy place but it seems that the company where I got almost everything is not holding up their end of the bargain and the two day shipping I have always had not longer is a benefit and i am getting ripped off. Take your business elsewhere. Shipping is faster at Ebay and they don't charge an extra $120 year for a membership you are not receiving. Even Wal mart has better pricing for two day shipping. Amazon has lied to all of us

Ordered an ethernet cord, it was delayed twice. Once without any notification. On the day it was supposed to arrive I had to approve the item prior to its arrival on a desktop computer which is difficult from work. The email they sent to verify the account is mine does not open or allow the downloading of the image. Currently dissatisfied.

I ordered from Amazon last week and I'd be happy to see a shopping cart notification on my phone for delivery updates. When I went to the app on Monday to show a coworker the item I received that was in the car, the app self updated to the box. I was very disappointed. Now the notification is a weird line that I don't even recognize (the smile), and it is for product advertising. My app never did that before. My Amazon settings auto-change when the app updated, since when?

Just use the website! The app has become completely unusable. I'm met with error screens at every turn. Constantly having to reload the app or the page to try to eek out the slightest bit of function from it. Wouldn't even have the app if it wasn't factory installed and impossible to delete.

The new update has ruined the amazon app. Super slow, sometimes won't load things, and pictures will only load for every other item I click on. Getting really frustrated. Also I hate the new UI. I hate the hoops you have to jump through to get to something like your orders or lists that used to be so simple.

I love the Prime app. However, it has a language glitch. . The app and the website automatically changes my language preferences to Spanish when I open a shared link (cart items) from someone who uses the settings in Spanish and it takes a number of times to reset the language back to English permanently. Please fix it. I have use this app for many years an couldn't be happier. It offers every option to make easier your shopping experience.

Extremely hard to navigate and difficult to use. Tried searching something and nothing related came up and whenever I tried to click on one thing, it takes me down a completely different lane and doesn't take me to where I want to go. It'll also start glitching and lagging randomly and I have to close the app for it to have a chance at working again.

Searching and filtering have gotten much less convenient over time. Harder to find what I need. Edit November 2020: getting still worse. There are no filters available at all on some clothing searches. Edit September 2021: dropped another star because it completely ignores my filters choices. I no longer have any control over search results.

Amazon, both the company and its app, just gets worse and worse. The interface is cumbersome and becomes less and less user friendly. Cumbersome to use, improper loading etc. I have noticed a marked decline in its products, vendors, shipping, service etc over the past year.

I wish they would stop changing the layout every month! The latest update is not user friendly. Too many clicks to view my orders, weird hidden locations for all features now. Prime shipping is not 2 days from order date, it's two days from shipping date, which could be a week out! We are all being scammed. Also can't return to kohls now, but my husband can?! Customer service is a total joke. Hate Amazon.

When checking orders, I need to see order number right away under listed orders instead of having to dive through three or four screens to find it. I also need to copy the number of the order instead of opening a link. When chatting with customer support I lose them because I cannot copy the stupid number when checking a status. Number is too long to remember. FIX IT

I don't have issues with the service Amazon orders, but the app has become a confusing mess. Sometimes the app is just a blank screen, the tabs along the bottom don't seem to offer a fixed function, and the addition of Amazon fresh as an overly is just weird. The website is better.

One of the worst e-commerce platforms that sucks! I recently had to purchase an insurance product from Amazon. I had to chat with the customer service three times to get a refund. Amazon talks about automation in reality they are prehistoric. They're chat system is real old. It does not have the facility to populate a URL or to upload an image

I've been noticing lately that Amazon has been behaving dodgy. The most recent (and the event that prompted this review) is a simple order that Amazon claimed was undeliverable (I've order LOTS with Amazon over the years but a package of hashbrowns and LED light bulbs are all of a sudden undeliverable. So the order gets cancelled, fine, reorder. Now the price has jumped up. Sketchy as hell.

The new UI is chaotic and messy, and since today the app won't even open up anymore - I launch it and it freezes up until Android asks me if I want to force stop it. System restarts won't help, clearing the cache doesn't do anything either. (Using a Razer Phone 2) Poor performance Amazon - don't "fix" what isn't broken.

Used to work well. Doesn't work now. Loads and then gives error message. Complained to customer service months ago but no change. Wound up disabling it. Can't uninstall it. Haven't ordered from Amazon since. I could order from my pc, but I haven't. I've been ordering from Walmart since that app works.

Ugh, the worst update ever. This damn thing auto updated and now all it does is crash and fail to connect with wifi. Why do this? I have to use Amazon so much and now finishing a transaction is torture. There appears to be no way to uninstall the update to make the ap useful again. Just give us our shopping cart back until this is fixed.

No worth it anymore. 2 day shipping is still a week late. Customer service is absolutely horrible. We had a blanket get delivered to the wrong address. Walmart is much better, cheaper and faster. It's funny. Amazon breaks their own contracts and it's ok. If we do it, they have a fit. So long Amazon.

Worst app ever! All the updates ruin my app it's less and less usable. Guess I'll go back to the browser, that honestly always works best. I agree too that Amazon is going down hill. The deliveries never arrive on time especially when the item is time sensitive. Customer service is a joke. Maybe we don't need Amazon as consumers.

Always got the ordered items on time, everything I ordered has been just like shown on the pictures! I really like the option on some products which I can by on monthly payments! The prices on Amazon are a bit higher (some of them even double more than in a physical shop prices).

I was using Amazon almost exclusively for a while. The single best improvement I can recommend is being able to filter results by material. Nordstrom has this feature and I've almost cut Amazon out of my life completely because it. And, for the price I pay, the markup on goods that will last more than a month is astronomically higher on Amazon than Nordstrom. So a higher price for lower quality materials? It's not even a question.

It seems the web version is way stable and better On this app, it wont show one of my order. The most ridiculous thing is that the order that disappear is the one still hasnt arrive!
